top-line.translation[0].definitions[0].d: top-line goods are expensive and thought to be of high quality
top-line.translation[0].definitions[0].e: top-line cars such as Mercedes, BMW and Porsche
top-line.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the amount of money received before costs have been taken away
top-line.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Last year we focused on cost-cutting rather than revenue, but this year we need to focus on the top line.
